com.jaguarlandrover.rvi

Class ServiceBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaguarlandrover.rvi.ServiceBundle

  • public class ServiceBundle
extends java.lang.Object
    The bundle of related services, a.k.a. an application. For example "body" or "hvac".

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static interface  ServiceBundle.ServiceBundleListener
      The Service bundle listener interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServiceBundle

        public ServiceBundle(Context context,
                     java.lang.String domain,
                     java.lang.String bundleIdentifier,
                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> servicesIdentifiers)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Instantiates a new Service bundle.
        Parameters:
        context - the Application context. This value cannot be null.
        domain - the domain portion of the RVI node's prefix (e.g., "jlr.com"). The domain must only contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, and/or periods. No other characters or whitespace are allowed. This value cannot be an empty string or null.
        bundleIdentifier - the bundle identifier (e.g., "hvac") The bundle identifier must only contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, and/or periods. No other characters or whitespace are allowed. This value cannot be an empty string or null.
        servicesIdentifiers - a list of the identifiers for all the local services. The service identifiers must only contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, and/or periods. No other characters or whitespace are allowed. This value cannot be an empty string or null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws an exception when the context is null, or if the domain, bundle identifier or any of the service identifiers are an empty string, contain special characters, or are null.

      • getRemoteService

        Service getRemoteService(java.lang.String serviceIdentifier)
        Gets the service object, given the service identifier. If one does not exist with that identifier, it is created.
        Parameters:
        serviceIdentifier - the service identifier
        Returns:
        the service

      • addLocalService

        public void addLocalService(java.lang.String serviceIdentifier)
        Add a local service to the service bundle. Adding services triggers a service-announce by the local RVI node.
        Parameters:
        serviceIdentifier - the identifier of the service

      • addLocalServices

        public void addLocalServices(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> serviceIdentifiers)
        Add several local services to the service bundle. Adding services triggers a service-announce by the local RVI node.
        Parameters:
        serviceIdentifiers - a list of service identifiers

      • removeLocalService

        public void removeLocalService(java.lang.String serviceIdentifier)
        Remote a local service from the service bundle. Removing services triggers a service-announce by the local RVI node.
        Parameters:
        serviceIdentifier - the identifier of the service

      • removeAllLocalServices

        public void removeAllLocalServices()
        Removes all the local services from the service bundle. Removing services triggers a service-announce by the local RVI node.

      • addRemoteService

        void addRemoteService(java.lang.String serviceIdentifier,
                      java.lang.String remoteNodeIdentifier)
        Add a remote service to the service bundle. If there is a pending service invocation with a matching service identifier, this invocation is sent to the remote node.
        Parameters:
        serviceIdentifier - the identifier of the service

      • removeRemoteService

        void removeRemoteService(java.lang.String serviceIdentifier)
        Remote a remote service from the service bundle.
        Parameters:
        serviceIdentifier - the identifier of the service

      • removeAllRemoteServices

        void removeAllRemoteServices()
        Remove all remote services from the service bundle.

      • invokeService

        public void invokeService(java.lang.String serviceIdentifier,
                          java.lang.Object parameters,
                          java.lang.Long timeout)
        Invoke/update a remote service on the remote RVI node
        Parameters:
        serviceIdentifier - the service identifier
        parameters - the parameters
        timeout - the timeout, in milliseconds. This is added to the current system time.
